text.headline: Since 2007, we've been providing agile development for a whole host of clients, ranging from small startups to established businesses.
text.content:
Along the way, we've built great web applications for clients, developed some juicy apps of our own, taught workshops, organized really cool events (Railscamps, Nodecamp, etc.), and met a bunch of great people. We work closely with our clients, which includes daily calls, honest retrospectives, and a story-driven planning process.
Have a project we can help bring to life? We're ready for service: team@railslove.com.
